page.title: 16CLUBS /SOCIETIESIN EARDISLEY
page.content: Eardisley has many groups and {societies}which offer the people of the area a wide variety of activities. There are two clubs for young people. {Eardisley Lads club}meets on Sundays to play football.They have about 20 members from several of the local villages. {Eardisley Young Farmers}is a very lively group.They have 60 members aged between 11-26.They enter many competitions and particularly successful with drama and entertaining They have meetings once a fortnight. {Earisley Little Theatre Club}is renowned in the area for its pantomimes.It has 35 members of all ages.As well as the panto which is performed in November they present 2 or 3 other productions through out the year.
